title: EA SPORTS™ FIFA 23 Ultimate Edition
description: PRE-ORDER* FIFA 23 Ultimate Edition before September 30, 2022 to receive: - 4,600 FIFA Points - 3 days of early access: Start playing FIFA 23 on Sep 27 - Untradeable FUT Ones to Watch item on Sep 30 - Untradeable FUT Team of the Week 1 Player - Kylian Mbappé Loan Item, for 5 FUT matches - FUT Ambassador Loan Player Pick, for 3 FUT matches - Career Mode Homegrown Talent
notes: *Conditions and restrictions apply. See https://www.ea.com/games/fifa/fifa-23/game-offer-and-disclaimers for details.Persistent internet connection; EA Account & acceptance of EA User Agreement (terms.ea.com) required to play. EA's Privacy & Cookie Policy applies (privacy.ea.com). You consent to any personal data collected through your use of EA's services being transferred to the United States, as further explained in the Privacy & Cookie Policy. Access to software content is limited to one EA Account & is non-transferable after purchase. Age restrictions apply, see (o.ea.com/ea/child-access for details). EA may provide certain free incremental content &/or updates. Product collects data for in-game advertising. EA may retire online features after 30 days notice at ea.com/service-updates. FIFA Points not available in Belgium.EA User Agreement: terms.ea.com/de for German residents and terms.ea.com for all other residentsEA Privacy & Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/de for German residents and privacy.ea.com for all other residents©2022 Electronic Arts Inc.
